fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Play Rough: Choose a player. If they don't have a Mimikyu profile picture, set their defense to **Isolated** for the next three nights. The **Isolated** must be bolded.
- Let's Snuggle Forever: Choose a player. Permanently set their defense to **Isolated**, **Fragile**, and **Vulnerable** at the same time, which must all be bolded. You may only do this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have 105 Special Defense (). This only applies to attacks that are magical in flavour.
- Your attack value cannot be higher than your Special Defense value for any reason.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: - Disguise: You have an  autovest. Your role is 2301: Pikachu until your autovest is broken. If you evolve as Pikachu, you still return to being Mimikyu Real Not Fake when your autovest is broken.
